name: FORM
description: Enter a surreal adventure where puzzles are built from dreams and memories. Solve the mystery behind an ancient artifact. Advance through a world that transforms around you. Transcend this existence.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290, equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480, equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11
